document.full_text: the pressure is on apple and amazon to consider the merits of issuing bonds for the first time in their corporate lives, especially now that google has demonstrated how low investors will go on yield to get a rare slice of large-cap tech company debt.
document.title: google bond deal sets stage for apple, amazon
lines_and_colors: the pressure is on apple and amazon to consider the merits of issuing bonds for the first time in their corporate lives, especially now that google has demonstrated how low investors will go on yield to get a rare slice of large-cap tech company debt.
